participant_1.name: Daniel
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Daniel finds joy in literature and music, often using them as a means to uplift his spirits.
participant_1.background: I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football. I am a deaf man. I read fantasy novels to escape my reality. I play music to cheer myself up. I love to eat shrimp and lobster.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Maya is cheerful and artistic, with a knack for creativity in both cooking and crafting. She enjoys connecting with others through shared interests.
participant_2.background: I have a diverse ethnic background, but I identify most with my Filipino heritage. I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things. My favorite hobby is knitting. I pretended to be asleep when the cop approached my car. I prefer to keep my hair natural, as I like to focus on the food I cook.

content.text: Hey! How is it going?
It is going well! How are you?
I am doing well! I just finished reading a fantasy novel and I am feeling really inspired.
Oh, that sounds fun! What was the novel about?
It was about a group of heroes who went on an adventure to save the world.
That sounds like a really exciting book! I love fantasy novels.
Me too! They are so much fun to read.
I know right! I also like to knit as a hobby. It is really relaxing.
I have never tried knitting before. Is it hard to learn?
Not at all! It is really easy to pick up.
Maybe I will give it a try sometime.
You should! It is really fun.
Okay! I will.
Great!
So, what is your favorite hobby?
I like to play video games with my friends.
Oh, that sounds fun! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play action games and adventure games.
I like to play those too!
We should play a game together sometime!
That would be fun!
